title: Media Element Schema
description: A schema to add media elements to the Murmurations Index

title.title: Group/Project/Organization Name
title.description: The full name of the group, project or organization

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the group (e.g., https://my-group.org or https://some-host.net/my-org)

tags.title: Tags/Type
tags.description: Keywords that describe the group such as its type, searchable in the Murmurations index

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the group

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the group
